fields.label: Index Page
fields.name: rawIndexSlug
fields.hint: Page to show as the index, or homepage, of the site.

fields.label: Category Post-Listing Page Settings
fields.name: categoryPostListingPageSettings
fields.hint: Settings for the category pages that list posts within that category.

fields.label: Category Post Listing Page
fields.name: rawCategoryPostListingPageSlug
fields.hint: Page to use as the category post listing page.

fields.label: Content Title
fields.name: contentTitle
fields.hint: Name for the page. Used primarily for SEO. Can use {siteName}, {siteDescription}, and {contentCategoryName}.

fields.label: Show Sidebar
fields.name: showSidebar
fields.hint: True to show the sidebar on this page, false otherwise.

fields.label: Not Found (404) Page Settings
fields.name: notFoundPageSettings
fields.hint: Settings for the Not Found page that is shown when linking to a page that doesn't exist.

fields.label: Content Title
fields.name: contentTitle
fields.hint: The title of the Not Found page.

fields.label: Use Featured Image
fields.name: featuredImageEnabled
fields.hint: When disabled, the featured image will not be shown for the Not Found page.

fields.label: Featured Image
fields.name: featuredImageUrl
fields.hint: Recommended size is 1200x630 (1.91:1), and under 5MB. You can use Canva to edit, and can grab a free image here: https://www.pexels.com/

fields.label: Featured Image Alt
fields.name: featuredImageAlt
fields.hint: A description of what's happening in the custom image. This is used for accessibility, so visually impaired readers can know what's up. Set to none to disable.

fields.label: Headline
fields.name: headline
fields.hint: Headline shown at the top of the page.

fields.label: Body Text
fields.name: bodyText
fields.hint: Body text shown under the headline.

fields.label: Body Image Alt
fields.name: bodyImageAlt
fields.hint: Description of the body image. For visually impaired users.

fields.label: Button Url
fields.name: buttonUrl
fields.hint: URL that the button points to.
